*Development on the Google PHP client library moved to `GitHub` with the release of the 1.0.0-alpha, and now the 1.0 branch has reached beta status there will be no further releases of the 0.6 branch of the library.* 

Please take a look at the latest version on https://github.com/google/google-api-php-client

For information on migrating, please take a look at this guide: https://developers.google.com/api-client-library/php/guide/migration

|| [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fexamples Browse All Samples] | [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/issues/entry?template=Request%20a%20Sample Request a New Sample] ||

This is an index of the Google APIs supported by the Google API PHP Client. You can also visit the `contrib` directory to see if an API is supported.

We provide samples for many Google APIs based on demand from developers like you. If you don't find a sample you want, feel free to [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/issues/entry?template=Request%20a%20Sample request a new sample].    In addition to providing links to available libraries and samples, the following list includes links to the documentation for each API, and the documentation provides links to the Help Forum.

<wiki:toc />

= Setup Instructions =
Follow the general [http://code.google.com/p/google-api-php-client/ setup] instructions for the Google APIs Client Library for PHP.
